participant_1.background:
I'm a big fan of sitcoms and would love to have a home with a big yard for my dogs.
i listen to a fall out boy record every day.
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.
I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.
I never start a fight, but I've been in my fair share of them.

participant_2.background:
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.
I am a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.
I'm proud of my ability to make the most of Halloween and enjoy it in my own way.
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

content.text: What is something that you do to keep your body and mind young?
I eat a balanced diet and exercise regularly. I also love to go for walks in the park. It's a great way to get some fresh air and clear your head.
That's great! I should start doing that too. I'm a big fan of sitcoms. What are some of your favorites?
I love The Office, Friends, and Seinfeld. They're all so funny and relatable. I also love Modern Family.
I've heard good things about Modern Family. I'll have to check it out. I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend. What kind of pets do you have?
I don't have any pets, but I would love to have a dog one day. I love animals!
I have a dog named Buddy. He's a golden retriever and he's the best dog in the world.
That sounds adorable! I love golden retrievers
